. @fhollande will preside this morning the ceremony of the National Day of memories of slavery, treaties and their abolitions
This ceremony completes 5 years of a constant desire to gather and reconcile memories.
Primary Health Care is an institutional initiative to which the present Government attaches emblematic significance. (1/2)
It will operate at the first level with the Local Health Units and at the second level with the Health Centers. (2/2)
Numerous ceremonies brought together wounded memories: at Verdun, Chemin des Dames, Drancy, Dakar, Madagascar, Algiers, for example
At the end of the year, when the first phase of the reform is completed, 239 Primary Care Local Units will operate.

On May 10, 2016, @fhollande announced that he wanted to create a foundation to give the memory of slavery a national institution.
The GIP will federate the actors of the memory of slavery and will implement educational, cultural and civic actions
In Thessaloniki there will be 25 SOM: 10 in Eyosmo and Kordelio, 7 in Toumba, 5 in Ambelokipi and Menemeni, 3 in Triandria.
Today will be launched the public interest group "Mission of the memory of slavery, treaties and their abolitions"
The GIP will become a foundation in 2018 and work with @Paris to create a museum dedicated to this memory and its legacy
To carry out this mission, @jeanmarcayrault accepted to take the presidency and will be accompanied by 5 qualified people (1/2)
(2/2) Doudou Diene, Olivier Laouchez, Leila Sy, Francoise Vergès and Lionel Zinsou
